con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"version":"1.0.0","title":"Sample ACORD API Project","description":"This is an example"},"schemes":["https"],"host":"acord.org","basePath":"/api/v2.1","paths":{"/claim":{"get":{"summary":"Gets the claim summary information for the claim number provided","description":"Gets the claim summary information for the claim number provided","parameters":[{"name":"policyId","in":"query","type":"string","description":"the policy number of the policy to which the claim which is being requested is associated"},{"name":"claimId","in":"query","type":"string","description":"the uniue id of the claim which is being requested"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ClaimSummary"}}}},"put":{"summary":"Adds a new Claim on the policy","description":"Adds a new Claim on the policy","parameters":[{"name":"policyId","in":"query","type":"string","description":"the policy number of the policy to which the claim which is being requested is associated"},{"name":"claimId","in":"query","type":"string","description":"the policy number of the policy to which the claim which is being requested is associated"},{"name":"claimInfoReq","in":"body","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"complete <ClaimsNotificationAddRq> xml message capturing the required info"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"string","description":"complete <ClaimsNotificationAddRs> xml message as response string"}}}}},"/driver":{"get":{"summary":"Gets the requested driver on the policy","description":"Gets the requested driver on the policy","responses":{"200":{"description":"OK"}}}}},"definitions":{"ClaimSummary":{"type":"object","properties":{"AdjusterParty":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AdjusterParty"},"ClaimsParty":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ClaimsParty"},"ClaimStatusCode":{"type":"string","enum":["open","closed","declined"]},"ClaimStatusDt":{"type":"string","format":"date"},"LossDt":{"type":"string","format":"date"}}},"AdjusterParty":{"type":"object","properties":{"ItemIdInfo":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ItemIdInfo"},"GeneralPartyInfo":{"type":"object","properties":{"NameInfo":{"type":"object","properties":{"PersonName":{"type":"object","properties":{"Surname":{"type":"string"},"GivenName":{"type":"string"},"TitlePrefix":{"type":"string"}}}}},"Addr":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Address"},"AdjusterPartyInfo":{"type":"object","properties":{"AdjusterTypeCd":{"type":"string"},"AssignedDt":{"type":"string","format":"date"},"CoverageCd":{"type":"string","enum":["ACCLB","AIL","PIP","LIAB"]},"LossCauseCd":{"type":"string"},"ReportNumber":{"type":"integer"}}}}}}},"ClaimsParty":{"type":"object","properties":{"ItemIdInfo":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ItemIdInfo"},"ClaimsInjuredInfo":{"type":"string"}}},"ItemIdInfo":{"type":"object","properties":{"SystemId":{"type":"string"},"AgencyId":{"type":"string"},"InsuredId":{"type":"string"}}},"Address":{"type":"object","properties":{"Addr1":{"type":"string"},"Addr2":{"type":"string"},"City":{"type":"string"},"StateProvCd":{"type":"string"},"Country":{"type":"string"},"PostalCode":{"type":"string"}}}}}
